Unreal Kickstart:

Learn level Design and how to design a game from scratch using UE5

Price: 250 Rs.

Welcome to the Unreal Kickstart course! This course is designed to help you get started with Unreal Engine 5, the industry-leading 3D game design software. By the end of this course, you'll be equipped with the foundational skills needed to create immersive games and applications.

What you'll learn:

  • Basics of Unreal Engine
  • User interface
  • Basics of level designing

Course Details:

  • Date: 21st December,2024
  • Time: 3PM - 5PM
  • Mode: Online
